CustomField.description: For the Green Gauge reports, we need to convert the 3 digit A customers in Canada to their respective B numbers
CustomField.formula: IF(MID( Zpl_Customer_ID__c , 6, 3)= "APA", "BRB", IF(MID( Zpl_Customer_ID__c , 6, 3)= "AMA", "BQA", IF(MID( Zpl_Customer_ID__c , 6, 3)= "AMC", "BQC", IF(MID( Zpl_Customer_ID__c , 6, 3)= "AIA", "BNC", IF(MID( Zpl_Customer_ID__c , 6, 3)= "AIR", "BNR", IF(MID( Zpl_Customer_ID__c , 6, 3)= "AIS", "BNS", IF(MID( Zpl_Customer_ID__c , 6, 3)= "A2C", "BHC", IF(MID( Zpl_Customer_ID__c , 6, 3)= "A2D", "BHD", IF(MID( Zpl_Customer_ID__c , 6, 3)= "A1A", "BDB", IF(MID( Zpl_Customer_ID__c , 6, 3)= "A1C", "BDC", IF(MID( Zpl_Customer_ID__c , 6, 3)= "A1D", "BDD", IF(MID( Zpl_Customer_ID__c , 6, 3)= "A1E", "BDE", IF(MID( Zpl_Customer_ID__c , 6, 3)= "A8A", "BFA", IF(MID( Zpl_Customer_ID__c , 6, 3)= "A8C", "BFC", IF(MID( Zpl_Customer_ID__c , 6, 3)= "A8F", "BFE", "XXX")))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Convert Canada A custs to B
